trends: There have been no other sightings in MIlan
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsat approx 6:30-6:45 i was looking east 120 degrees on our deck in milan, ny using a telescope to see a star just below jupiter. with my other eye, i noticed bright green light in the south 186 degrees and first saw what appeared to be a firework descending at a 45 degree angle and going beneath the tree cover. i heard a faint buzzing\humming sound which i hear occasionally when i am outside at night - normally i assume this is an animal sound, not something in the sky! i did not feel scared when i saw the object, and i thought about it all night. as i began thinking more about it i became concerned that something landed with beings in it that may be on the property, looking around. i woke up unexpectedly at 1:23am and thought i heard a loud sound around 2am but it could have been the wood burning stove. i checked the site i first posted my sighting and noticed there were a total of 11 similar accounts. this morning there are a total of 16 similar accounts. i lost sight of the object because it fell out of view through the tree cover.
Summary: Green comet light (like firework) observed descending
